div.h2: Nurturing Individual Potential at Edmeston Central School

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

h2.span: Welcome to the Edmeston Central School District website. We hope you will find information that will be useful and that will enable you to feel even more connected to our school. At Edmeston we pride ourselves on the close relationship of school and community and we hope our website can act as a tool to further strengthen that relationship. Edmeston is a small school dedicated to creating Opportunity for Lifetime Learning.

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

br.span: We are constantly reviewing our programs and practices to provide an excellent education to students at all levels. Outstanding community support has allowed us to update our facilities at regular intervals and we are determined to do the same in the area of information technology. We hope you enjoy your web visit. To contact our Webmaster, please email jbolton@edmeston.net.

p.br: Implement a consistent curricular program in all subject areas to enhance student learning and achievement encompassing 21st Century Skills.
Embed character education and development awareness of social emotional needs across the curriculum to create a balanced learner who is mentally, physically, and emotionally healthy.
Integrate current technologies in Pre-K through 12th grade to enhance student learning and enable our students to demonstrate the skills necessary to thrive in a 21st Century environment.
Maintain the financial stability of the school district.

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;

span.strong: Pamela Grimm, Director of Special Education
